The '''smiling creeper''' was a [[passive mob]] present in the April Fool's [[Love and Hugs Update]], and is a variant of the [[creeper]].

== Spawn ==
All creepers in snapshot [[15w14a]] are replaced by smiling creepers.

== Behavior ==
Smiling creepers behave like normal [[creepers]], except that the explosion of a smiling creeper does not break blocks or cause damage. Instead, the smiling creeper drops 2-4 [[Poppy|poppies]] that the player can not pick up.
